pullrequest.title: Make gazebo work w/ latest libAtlasSimInterface3.0.1

content.raw:
Yea, don't know if you saw my other mail, the latest libAtlasSimInterface debug version I was rushing out to you starts a walk after 5 seconds, as we debugged the bigger issue of things not working together.  That is independant of this drcsim code.

In addition, I am positive that _v4 now doesn't work again, as the changes I made to AtlasPlugin.cpp and VRCPlugin.cpp didn't get from BOX to this code branch properly.  But now that I'm an expert in submitting here, I will execute that in the morning, in addition to getting you a new AtlasSimInterface.3.0.1 that not only doesn't walk automatically, but also has some bugfixes that improves walking behavior.

I unfortunately have a commitment tonight so I can't get that work done till the AM. :(
content.html:
Yea, don't know if you saw my other mail, the latest libAtlasSimInterface debug version I was rushing out to you starts a walk after 5 seconds, as we debugged the bigger issue of things not working together. That is independant of this drcsim code.

In addition, I am positive that _v4 now doesn't work again, as the changes I made to AtlasPlugin.cpp and VRCPlugin.cpp didn't get from BOX to this code branch properly. But now that I'm an expert in submitting here, I will execute that in the morning, in addition to getting you a new AtlasSimInterface.3.0.1 that not only doesn't walk automatically, but also has some bugfixes that improves walking behavior.

I unfortunately have a commitment tonight so I can't get that work done till the AM. :(
